process_seurat

process_seurat.Rd

Wrapper function to cluster cells by gene expression

Usage

process_seurat(
  x,
  assay = "RNA",
  dims = 1:10,
  res = 0.4,
  reduction = NULL,
  harmony = F,
  group.by.vars = "samples"
)

Arguments

x

Seurat object

assay

assay name of gene expression. Defaults to "RNA"

dims

no. of PCs to use. Defaults to 1:10

res

clustering resolution. Defaults to 0.4

reduction

reduction name if present. Defaults to NULL

harmony

if TRUE, run Harmony integration for samples

group.by.vars

variable to integrate by if harmony = TRUE
